title: Reinsurance treaty actuarial opinions
personalDataVerified: Actuary name, ceding company, reinsurer, treaty terms, pricing assumptions, coverage limits
personalDataVisible: Link to reinsurer system (ceding companies and reinsurance brokers, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fraudulent reinsurance pricing enabling insurer insolvency. Domain binding verifies credentialed actuary. Multi-billion dollar risk transfers between insurers. International reinsurance market. Protects ceding company from inadequate coverage. Critical for catastrophe reinsurance where pricing determines insurer solvency after major disasters.
